mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_todo (title, dueDate, writer) VALUES (#{title}, #{dueDate, jdbcType=DATE, javaType=java.time.LocalDate}, #{writer})
mapper.select: SELECT tno, title, dueDate, writer, finished FROM tbl_todo ORDER BY tno DESC
mapper.update: update tbl_todo set title = #{title}, dueDate = #{dueDate}, finished = #{finished} where tno = #{tno}
